objectives: Understand how Gatsby plugins extend functionality and improve website performance through the plugin ecosystem
Learn how to implement essential image optimization plugins like gatsby-plugin-image and gatsby-plugin-sharp
Master SEO and metadata management using gatsby-plugin-react-helmet and gatsby-plugin-sitemap
Implement Progressive Web App features using gatsby-plugin-manifest and gatsby-plugin-offline for enhanced user experience
Discover how to integrate documentation plugins like gatsby-theme-docz and docsie-gatsby-plugin for comprehensive site documentation
